body.p: The MCP Options dialog allows you to configure key settings for the MCP (Main Control Panel) interface. Use these options to customize the behavior and appearance of the panel to suit your workflow.

dlentry.dd: Enables or disables the display of the toolbar at the top of the MCP. When enabled, quick access buttons for common actions are visible.
Toggles the visibility of track icons in the MCP. Track icons help visually distinguish different track types.
Switches the MCP to a more compact layout, reducing the vertical space used by each track. Useful for sessions with many tracks.
Displays the send controls for each track in the MCP, allowing you to quickly adjust send levels and routing.
Shows or hides the FX insert slots for each track, making it easier to manage effects directly from the MCP.
Displays the track number next to each track name for easier identification and navigation.
Enables the display of automation envelopes for each track within the MCP, providing quick access to automation parameters.
When enabled, the MCP automatically scrolls to and highlights the currently selected track in the main window.
